description: Returns information about all of the operations that return an operation ID and that have ever been performed on domains that were registered by the current account. This command runs only in the us-east-1 Region.

parameters.name: MaxItems
parameters.description: Number of domains to be returned. Default: 20

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: An arrays of the domains operation types. (string) ---

nested_items.name: OperationId
nested_items.description: Identifier returned to track the requested action.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the requested operation in the system.

nested_items.name: SubmittedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the request was submitted.

nested_items.name: StatusFlag
nested_items.description: Automatically checks whether there are no outstanding operations on domains that need customer attention.
PENDING_ACCEPTANCE: The operation is waiting for acceptance from the account that is receiving the domain.
PENDING_CUSTOMER_ACTION: The operation is waiting for customer action, for example, returning an email.
PENDING_AUTHORIZATION: The operation is waiting for the form of authorization. For more information, see ResendOperationAuthorization.
PENDING_PAYMENT_VERIFICATION: The operation is waiting for the payment method to validate.
PENDING_SUPPORT_CASE: The operation includes a support case and is waiting for its resolution.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the last change was made in Unix time format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: NextPageMarker
nested_items.description: If there are more operations than you specified for MaxItems in the request, submit another request and include the value of NextPageMarker in the value of Marker.
